about_the_game:
With Music for Clip Maker you will get 66 musical instruments for making excellent videos, films, clips and art images.

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, 48 musical instruments, which can be placed on the floor, you can find in the section "Constructor", 18 musical instruments, which could be added to the character's hands, you can find in the section "Keep in hand". Animations for the musical instruments you can find in the free DLC "Animations".

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.
detailed_description:
With Music for Clip Maker you will get 66 musical instruments for making excellent videos, films, clips and art images.

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, 48 musical instruments, which can be placed on the floor, you can find in the section "Constructor", 18 musical instruments, which could be added to the character's hands, you can find in the section "Keep in hand". Animations for the musical instruments you can find in the free DLC "Animations".

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.
name: Music for Clip maker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Music for Clip Maker - have fun by creating your own 3D video stories, films, clips and videos. Specially created for amateurs and artists to bring your stories to life.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
